Parody Website Notice

This is a parody website inspired by automotive buying platforms like "wirkaufendeinauto.de" but focused on computer RAM instead of cars. While the concept and design are satirical in nature, all RAM purchasing services offered are genuine and legally compliant.

This parody falls under fair use and parody protection guidelines. We do not claim any affiliation with or endorsement by the original automotive platforms that inspired this concept.

Terms of Service

Last updated: January 9, 2026

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using the RAM Buying website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

2. Service Description

RAM Buying provides computer memory (RAM) evaluation and purchasing services. We offer:

  • Online RAM specification evaluation and instant quote generation
  • Professional assessment of submitted RAM modules
  • Purchase of qualifying computer memory at fair market prices
  • Technical support and guidance for RAM identification

Our services are intended for individuals and businesses looking to sell computer memory modules in good working condition.

3. Eligibility and Account Requirements

To use our services, you must:

  • Be at least 18 years of age or have parental consent
  • Have legal ownership of the RAM modules you wish to sell
  • Provide accurate and complete information during the evaluation process
  • Have a valid email address and phone number for communication

We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.

4. Evaluation and Pricing Process

4.1 Initial Quotes

Online quotes are estimates based on the information you provide. Final pricing may differ based on actual condition, specifications, and market conditions at the time of evaluation.

4.2 Final Assessment

All RAM modules are subject to professional testing and evaluation upon receipt. We reserve the right to:

  • Adjust pricing based on actual condition and specifications
  • Reject modules that do not meet our quality standards
  • Return rejected modules at no cost to the seller

4.3 Market Fluctuations

RAM prices fluctuate based on market conditions. Quotes are valid for 30 days from generation, subject to significant market changes.

5. Shipping and Handling

5.1 Seller Responsibilities

When shipping RAM modules to us, you are responsible for:

  • Proper packaging to prevent damage during transit
  • Using appropriate anti-static protection
  • Including all necessary documentation and contact information
  • Ensuring modules are securely packaged

5.2 Shipping Costs

For orders with estimated value over $100, we provide prepaid shipping labels. For smaller orders, shipping costs are deducted from the final payment.

5.3 Risk of Loss

Risk of loss transfers to us upon receipt of your shipment at our facility. We recommend using tracked shipping services and consider purchasing insurance for valuable shipments.

6. Payment Terms

6.1 Payment Processing

Payment is processed within 2 business days after final evaluation and acceptance of your RAM modules. Available payment methods include:

  • PayPal transfer
  • Bank wire transfer (for amounts over $500)
  • Check by mail

6.2 Minimum Payment

We maintain a minimum payment threshold of $25. Orders below this amount may be held until additional qualifying modules are received or paid via check with applicable processing fees.

6.3 Tax Responsibilities

You are responsible for reporting any income from RAM sales according to applicable tax laws. We may issue 1099 forms for qualifying transactions as required by law.

7. Prohibited Items and Conduct

We do not accept:

  • Stolen, counterfeit, or fraudulently obtained memory modules
  • Modules with removed or altered identification labels
  • Physically damaged or non-functional memory
  • Memory types older than DDR3
  • Modules that fail our authenticity verification

Attempting to sell prohibited items may result in permanent suspension from our services and potential legal action.

8. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these terms by reference.

We collect only the information necessary to provide our services and do not sell or share personal information with third parties except as required for payment processing and shipping.

9. Intellectual Property

The RAM Buying website, including its design, content, and functionality, is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not:

  • Copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission
  • Use our trademarks or branding without authorization
  • Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code
  • Create derivative works based on our services

10. Disclaimers and Limitations

10.1 Service Availability

We strive to maintain continuous service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Services may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance, technical issues, or other factors beyond our control.

10.2 Accuracy of Information

While we make every effort to provide accurate pricing and technical information, we do not warrant the completeness or accuracy of all content on our website.

10.3 Limitation of Liability

Our liability is limited to the value of the RAM modules in question. We are not liable for:

  • Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
  • Loss of profits or business opportunities
  • Damages exceeding the value of your RAM modules
  • Issues arising from third-party shipping services

11. Dispute Resolution

11.1 Customer Service

We encourage resolving disputes through our customer service team first. Contact us at support@rambuying.com or +1 (555) RAM-BUYS for assistance.

11.2 Arbitration

Any disputes that cannot be resolved through customer service will be settled through binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the American Arbitration Association.

11.3 Governing Law

These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, without regard to conflict of law principles.

12. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Modified" date. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

For significant changes that materially affect your rights, we will provide additional notice via email to registered users.

13. Termination

Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination:

  • You may no longer use our services
  • We will complete processing of any RAM modules already received
  • Outstanding payments will be processed according to normal procedures
  • Certain provisions (privacy, intellectual property, limitations) survive termination

14. Contact Information

For questions about these terms or our services, please contact us:

Email: legal@rambuying.com

Phone: +1 (555) RAM-BUYS

Mail: RAM Buying Legal Department
123 Memory Lane
Tech City, TC 12345

15. Severability

If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the remaining terms remain in full force and effect.

By using RAM Buying services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
